text: The 2007 Sham Shui Po District Council election was held on 18 November 2007 to elect all 21 elected members to the 26-member District Council. ==Overall election results== Before election: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:76.2%;" | 16 | style="background:red; width:23.8%;" | 5 |- | Pro-democracy | Pro-Beijing |} Change in composition: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:61.9%;" | 13 | style="background:red; width:38.1%;" | 8 |- | Pro-democracy | Pro-Beijing |} ==References== ==External links== * Election Results - Overall Results Category:2007 Hong Kong local elections
title: 2007 Sham Shui Po District Council election
